title: "_______ is not unbalanced, you just cannot make mistakes against them."
body:
Had a discussion with a friend about balanced champs. Champs like Yasuo, Zed, and Vayne came up. He said "they're balanced, you just can't make a single mistake against them or they will steamroll you for the entire match." Which to me, says it's unbalanced. If a champ requires such precise play that you can't make a single mistake without instantly losing lane and getting snowballed out of the lane, that says there's a lack of balance. 

I'm also a bit biased as these are my top 3 most hated champs.

Issues with this:
-most junglers will never camp a lane because they went behind. Especially vs zed, the power of tilt is too strong and the laner will just keep dying every time they try to set up a gank
-zed, being a manaless, high waveclear magesassin that builds AD will EASILY shove in your wave and work down your turret, while the likelihood of you getting a kill from roaming is nowhere near 100%. Now zed has a bigger farm/gold lead and you MAYBE got a kill or assist.
-Building to counter him is fine if you are AD, but Zhonyas rush is a pretty shitty build for waveclear / roaming. *no mana regen, no movespeed, no mana* if you shove in to set up your roam, he can kill you in your cooldowns / you will not have enough mana to effectively roam. OR ZED FOLLOWS YOU DOWN BECAUSE HE HAS A LEAD AND CAN NULLIFY YOU ANYWHERE YOU GO

Zed's only way to meaningfully harass you is to W forward, the jungler can gank as soon as he does that.

Building to counter him can also mean stacking CDR to the point where your CC/ult/waveclear is constantly up. He'll have a much harder time killing you then.

The issue with Zed is not after 2 or 3 items are completed.

IMO, Yasuo and Zed are balanced. 

Yasuo is balanced around having a higher than average skill floor and needing to still build at least two crit items for maximum damage output, instead of all those other glass cannons who go around building juggernaut. Zed is balanced around being 75% skillshot-based and being supremely useless in the wrong hands, as well as pretty much every class having anti-Zed itemization at their disposal ({{item:3157}} for AP's, {{item:3139}} for AD's and tanks are just tanky. Granted, Zed's power level is pretty over the top right now due to the vast amount of anti-AP and ArPen in the game atm.

I do think that Vayne is unbalanced in the sense that there's very little weakness in her base kit to abuse beyond outranging her, and that there's no anti-itemizing against her. I suppose she's supposed to be balanced like Yasuo (relatively high skill floor) but since she's ranged and has free dashes (unlike Yas who is melee and has targeted dashes), she's got a huge amount of margin for error.

If you want to ask me about unbalanced, here's mine: {{champion:114}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:104}} .

Then there's a whole slew of Champions that are somewhat balanced, but too strong because Riot gives them too much love: {{champion:103}} {{champion:64}} (to name a few).

Again, just my opinions.
